Defines class DNSProcessor with attribute(s) and method(s). Performs dns check by domain name and cluster number.

class dns_explorer.pro.DNSProcessor(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: FileCheck, ProConfig

Defines class DNSProcessor with attribute(s) and method(s). Performs dns check by domain name and cluster number.

It defines:

attributes:
_TOOL_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
_SUB_DNS_CONFIG - List of subdomains.
methods:
__init__ - Initials DNSProcessor constructor.
_reverse_dns - Reverse DNS by IP address.
_dns_request - Executes dns request.
execute - Executes exploration of dns.
_SUB_DNS_CONFIG: str = '/../conf/subdomains.yaml'¶
_TOOL_VERBOSE: str = 'DNS_EXPLORER::PRO::DNS_PROCESSOR'¶
_dns_request(domain: str, verbose: bool = False) → None[source]¶

Executes dns request.

Parameters:

  • domain (<str>) – Domain name

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Exceptions:

ATSTypeError | ATSValueError

_reverse_dns(ip: str, verbose: bool = False) → List[str] | None[source]¶

Reverse DNS by IP address.

Parameters:

  • ip (<str>) – IP address

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

List of dns names | None

Return type:

<Optional[List[str]]>

Exceptions:

ATSTypeError | ATSValueError

execute(domain: str, cluster: int, verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Executes exploration of dns.

Parameters:

  • domain (<str>) – Domain name

  • cluster (<int>) – Cluster number

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

True (success operation) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

ATSTypeError | ATSValueError
